title: (x) Voss sparkling water label - Praxis {Erik S}
content:
deers,

i need to know the font used for “sparkling” text.

it seems to be frutiger/eras/formata... buh!

thank you!!

diana

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124011im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Spirit_5535.jpg)

 [‹ RIOT ON SUNSET STRIP 1960s movie poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124011/http:/typophile.com/node/30676 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) '03' serif - (similar to) Walbaum {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124011/http:/typophile.com/node/30685 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dyanasid

comments.content:
“sparkling” is Eras

[edit: crud. no it isn’t.]
Looks like some Gerard Unger typeface to me?

_Looks like some Gerard Unger typeface to me?_

[Praxis](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124011/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.117477.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=sparkling&sampleSize=48), the sans companion for Demos.
